import { useContext, useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { AppContext } from '../../context/context' import icon_human from '../../assets/img/icon-human.png' import icon_alien from '../../assets/img/icon-alien.png' const Card = props => { const { character } = props const { deleteCharacter } = useContext(AppContext) const card_content = useRef() const deleteEnter = () => card_content.current.classList.add('opacity-50') const deleteLeave = () => card_content.current.classList.remove('opacity-50') const remove = () => deleteCharacter( character.id ) return (
{ 'Human' === character.species ? ( ) : ( ) }
{ character.name }
{ character.species }
); } /** *

{personaje.name}

{personaje.species}

{personaje.gender}

*/ export default Card
